description: This supremely well-thought-out cycling pack is designed for everyone who lives their life on or near their bike. A supportive, breathable harness system and ventilated back panel keep you cool when you're pedalling hard, while an integrated high-vis rain cover protect you and your stuff on wet rides. The main compartment is thougthfully divided to ensure secure storage of your laptop, documents and work/school clothes, with several other clips and pockets to store your helmet, glasses, phone and other essentials. Kickstand rails let the pack stand unsupported for convenient loading and storage at your desk.Shoulder straps are mesh-covered die cut foam for superior breathablility.Removable sternum strap has an integrated safety whistle.Back panel is mesh-covered ridge foam for a cool and comfortable fit.Removable waistbelt is 25mm webbing.Main compartment has a padded laptop sleeve, document sleeve and clothing/shoe pocket.Front organization pocket.Scratch-free sunglasses/device pocket.Front panel stretch mesh pocket.Open and zippered side panel stretch mesh pockets offer additional storage options.Lidlock securely stows helmet when not in use.Kickstand technology lets pack stand in a stable, vertical position for loading and storage.Compression straps and zippered expansion let you tailor pack volume to load size for excellent ergonomics.High-visibility integrated pack cover.Reflective print and zipper pulls.Blinker light attachment point.
name: Osprey Metron 26L Bike Pack - Unisex
